RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo SELECT DISK=0&echo CLEAN&echo CONVERT GPT&echo CREATE PARTITION EFI SIZE=300&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=FAT32 LABEL="System"&echo CREATE PARTITION MSR SIZE=16)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY&echo SHRINK MINIMUM=5000&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL="Windows"&echo CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL="Recovery")"
cmd.exe /c "diskpart.exe /s "X:\diskpart.txt" >>"X:\diskpart.log" || ( type "X:\diskpart.log" & echo diskpart encountered an error. & pause & exit /b 1 )"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo WScript.Echo "Scanning for newly created SYSTEM registry hive file to disable Windows Defender services..."&echo Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject"^))"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo Set existing = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary"^)&echo Function Execute(command^)&echo WScript.Echo "Running command '" + command + "'"&echo Set shell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell"^))"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo Set exec = shell.Exec(command^)&echo Do While exec.Status = 0&echo WScript.Sleep 100&echo Loop&echo WScript.Echo exec.StdOut.ReadAll&echo WScript.Echo exec.StdErr.ReadAll)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo Execute = exec.ExitCode&echo End Function&echo Function FindHiveFiles&echo Set FindHiveFiles = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary"^)&echo For Each drive In fso.Drives)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo If drive.IsReady And drive.DriveLetter ^<^> "X" Then&echo For Each folder In Array("$Windows.~BT\NewOS\Windows", "Windows"^))"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo file = fso.BuildPath(fso.BuildPath(drive.RootFolder, folder^), "System32\config\SYSTEM"^)&echo If fso.FileExists(file^) And fso.FileExists(file + ".LOG1"^) And fso.FileExists(file + ".LOG2"^) Then)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo FindHiveFiles.Add file, Nothing&echo End If&echo Next&echo End If&echo Next&echo End Function&echo For Each file In FindHiveFiles)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo WScript.Echo "Will ignore file at '" + file + "' because it was already present when Windows Setup started."&echo existing.Add file, Nothing&echo Next&echo Do)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo For Each file In FindHiveFiles&echo If Not existing.Exists(file^) Then&echo ret = 1&echo While ret ^> 0&echo WScript.Sleep 500&echo ret = Execute("reg.exe LOAD HKLM\mount " + file^))"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo Wend&echo For Each service In Array("Sense", "WdBoot", "WdFilter", "WdNisDrv", "WdNisSvc", "WinDefend"^))"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo ret = Execute("reg.exe ADD HKLM\mount\ControlSet001\Services\" + service + " /v Start /t REG_DWORD /d 4 /f"^)&echo Next&echo ret = Execute("reg.exe UNLOAD HKLM\mount"^))"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\defender.vbs" (echo WScript.Echo "Found and successfully modified SYSTEM registry hive file at '" + file + "'. This window will now close."&echo WScript.Sleep 5000&echo Exit Do&echo End If)"

SynchronousCommand.Description: Inicia o Orquestrador de Instalação da SE Promotora

Extensions.File: HKCU = &H80000001 key = "Control Panel\NotifyIconSettings" Set reg = GetObject("winmgmts://./root/default:StdRegProv") If reg.EnumKey(HKCU, key, names) = 0 Then If Not IsNull(names) Then For Each name In names reg.SetDWORDValue HKCU, key + "\" + name, "IsPromoted", 1 Next End If End If
